betterquesting:10.desc:8: When I was a young boy My father took me to the Greg, to see an LCR He said "soon when you grow up, would you be, the creator of a mark III, A sun down on earth?" He said "Will you, finish it, the long craft and all the boring recipes and all the passive stuff?", "Because one day, you would need more reactors, to lead you into the sun, and join into the Greg".

Fun squid penis fact: The squid's penis is contained within its mantle, a hollow cavity with only one opening: The siphon. The siphon is a muscular organ which sucks in water and then shoots the water out along with anything else in mantle--which is how squids swim, as well as shit, as well as breathe, as well as shoot ink (squid anatomy is weird). For the penis to go through the siphon, it has to massively enlarge in both girth and length when erect, in some species becoming as long as the squid itself so that it may emerge through the siphon and enter the siphon of a female to ejaculate.

Imagine you didn't have a dick and balls where you have them. You spread your asschecks to present your butthole to your partner. Then, a two foot long dick emerged through your butthole to penetrate your partner. That is how many squids have sex.

In most species, though, squid sex is way weirder. The penis is able to roll up all the sperm into a sticky glob, which the squid then grabs with one of its tentacles so that he can manually place it within the female. Once inside the female, this glob bursts open to fertilize her egg cells.

Imagine that you didn't have a dick and balls where you have them. You spread your asschecks to show your butthole to your partner. You then shit out a worm-shaped glob of cum, picked up that glob, stuck your hand up your partner's vagina, at which point the glob explodes. That is how most squids have sex.

I sent an angel to watch over you last night, but it came back and I asked, "Why?" The angel said, "Angels don't watch over angels!" Twenty angels are in your world. Ten of them are sleeping, nine of them are playing and one of them is reading this message. God has seen you struggling with some things and God says it's over. A blessing is coming your way. If you believe in God send this th 14 friends, including me. If I don't get it back, I guess I'm not one of them. As soon as you get 5 replies, someone you love will quietly surprise you...not joking. Pass this message on. Please don't ignore it. You are being tested and God is going to fix two big things in your favor. If you believe in God, drop everything and pass it on. Tomorrow will be the best day of your life.

Question for those in chat: Let's say you are sleeping in bed with your parents. You are in the middle. You wake up and want to get up, but you notice that you are partially inserted into your mom and your dad is partially inserted into you and they are still asleep. Which way do you thrust to get out?

What's your guy's favorite thing to get for lunch?

For me, it's the McChicken. The best fast food sandwich. I even ask for extra McChicken sauce packets and the staff is so friendly and more than willing to oblige.

One time I asked for McChicken sauce packets and they gave me three. I said, "Wow, three for free!" and the nice friendly McDonald's worker laughed and said, "I'm going to call you 3-for-free!".

Now the staff greets me with "hey it's 3-for-free!" and ALWAYS give me three packets. It's such a fun and cool atmosphere at my local McDonald's restaurant, I go there at least 3 times a week for lunch and a large iced coffee with milk instead of cream, 1-2 times for breakfast on the weekend, and maybe once for dinner when I'm in a rush but want a great meal that is affordable, fast, and can match my daily nutritional needs.

I even dip my fries in McChicken sauce, it's delicious! What a great restaurant.

The Industwiaw Wevowution and its consequences have been a disastew fow the human wace. They have gweatwy incweased the wife-expectancy of those of us who wive in “advanced” countwies, but they have destabiwized society, have made wife unfuwfiwwing, have subjected human beings to indignities, have wed to widespwead psychowogicaw suffewing (in the Thiwd Wowwd to physicaw suffewing as weww) and have infwicted sevewe damage on the natuwaw wowwd. The continued devewopment of technowogy wiww wowsen the situation. It wiww cewtainwy subject human being to gweatew indignities and infwict gweatew damage on the natuwaw wowwd, it wiww pwobabwy wead to gweatew sociaw diswuption and psychowogicaw suffewing, and it may wead to incweased physicaw suffewing even in “advanced” countwies. The industwiaw-technowogicaw system may suwvive ow it may bweak down. If it suwvives, it MAY eventuawwy achieve a wow wevew of physicaw and psychowogicaw suffewing, but onwy aftew passing thwough a wong and vewy painfuw pewiod of adjustment and onwy at the cost of pewmanentwy weducing human beings and many othew wiving owganisms to engineewed pwoducts and mewe cogs in the sociaw machine. Fuwthewmowe, if the system suwvives, the consequences wiww be inevitabwe: Thewe is no way of wefowming ow modifying the system so as to pwevent it fwom depwiving peopwe of dignity and autonomy. If the system bweaks down the consequences wiww stiww be vewy painfuw. But the biggew the system gwows the mowe disastwous the wesuwts of its bweakdown wiww be, so if it is to bweak down it had best bweak down soonew wathew than watew. We thewefowe advocate a wevowution against the industwiaw system. This wevowution may ow may not make use of viowence; it may be sudden ow it may be a wewativewy gwaduaw pwocess spanning a few decades. We can’t pwedict any of that. But we do outwine in a vewy genewaw way the measuwes that those who hate the industwiaw system shouwd take in owdew to pwepawe the way fow a wevowution against that fowm of society. This is not to be a POWITICAW wevowution. Its object wiww be to ovewthwow not govewnments but the economic and technowogicaw basis of the pwesent society. In this awticwe we give attention to onwy some of the negative devewopments that have gwown out of the industwiaw-technowogicaw system. Othew such devewopments we mention onwy bwiefwy ow ignowe awtogethew. This does not mean that we wegawd these othew devewopments as unimpowtant. Fow pwacticaw weasons we have to confine ouw discussion to aweas that have weceived insufficient pubwic attention ow in which we have something new to say. Fow exampwe, since thewe awe weww-devewoped enviwonmentaw and wiwdewness movements, we have wwitten vewy wittwe about enviwonmentaw degwadation ow the destwuction of wiwd natuwe, even though we considew these to be highwy impowtant.
Burn solid fuel (like coal for example) in it for steam
Use liquids like lava for steam
Use the SUN for steam (best steam method)

Hey you. You wanna drink something the dinosaurs drank?

You wanna drink what Micheal Jackson drank? What Freddie Mercury, Van Gogh, Shakespeare and Moses? You wanna be cool like them?

Drink some water. It's the latest trend that EVERYONE is doing.

Be healthy and drink this amazing liquid that has been here since the dawn of time, and still works properly. Something that every living being on earth has had contact with, since the very beginning.

I mean how cool is that? That's really awesome and you know it.

So why don't you drink some water right now and think about how you are doing the exact same thing as others have done in millions of years. Drinking water.

Drink water and be one of the cool kids.
betterquesting:10.name:8: DONT FORGET WATER IN BOILER!!! THIS IS NOT AFRICA

betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Ah, the Steam Age in GregTech! You young whippersnappers with your fancy machines don't know the struggle we had back in the day. It was a time when coal was more precious than diamonds, and every step you took required manual labor harder than mining bedrock with a wooden pickaxe.

[Insert Drake Hotline Bling image here]

🎵"Steam Age, Steam Age, got me workin' in a cage,
Gotta crank that boiler, gotta earn that wage,
Modded Minecraft, got me in a rage,
But GregTech's the way, in every age!" 🎵

Remember when crafting a single machine meant digging to bedrock, climbing the highest mountains, and sacrificing a dozen cows just to get enough resources? And then, there was that sweet, sweet sound of your steam engine chugging away.

[Insert "Running in the 90s" meme]

🎵"I'm runnin' on Steam, like I'm in a dream,
Turning ores into bars, it's a team,
GregTech's the meme, but it's not what it seems,
We're living in a steam-powered dream!" 🎵

And don't get me started on the sound of steam escaping from your pipes, it's like music to my ears. Who needs Spotify when you have that sweet, sweet hiss?

[Insert "This is fine" dog meme]

🎵"My setup's a mess, it's a total distress,
But I'll make it work, I'm in GregTech's caress,
I may be stressed, but I digress,
In the Steam Age, I'm a real progress!" 🎵

So next time you complain about the grind in Minecraft, just remember the pioneers of the Steam Age. We paved the way for your fancy contraptions and automatic machines. Respect your GregTech elders, kiddos!
You can use the macerator to double your ore
You can make this primitive water pump to get infinite water. Amount of water pumped/s depends on biome.
Coke oven allows you to turn coal into more efficient coke and also makes creosote in the process
Make these by treating wood with creosote oil
This tank can be used to store large amounts of creosote oil
Compressor is used to make bricks and other shit
No Description
Hook allows for better movement shits

In the annals of antiquity, there once resided an erudite individual by the name of 'neeols.' He possessed an insatiable curiosity, fervently immersing himself in esoteric pursuits as he meticulously manipulated his venerable abacus and honed his consummate expertise in the art of mindlessly farming melons.

Then, serendipity graced the cobblestone streets of Germany during his vacay from his 9/5 occupation, as neeols serendipitously crossed paths with a gentleman known as Greg. Exuding an aura of conspicuously industrial allure, Greg's enigmatic origin story beckoned neeols's insatiable curiosity, prompting him to extend an erudite invitation for an intellectual rendezvous.

During this convivial encounter, they engaged in discourse of a profoundly Gregic nature, delving deep into the esoteric realms of quantum entanglement, the enigmatic dimensions of furries, and the intricate complexities inherent in the phenomenon of photosynthesis.

Greg regaled neeols with the saga of his emergence from the subterranean womb of a cavern, born to a mother of nine, where his nascent Gregic talents forged the divine spark of fire. This seminal event ultimately elevated him to the exalted chieftaincy of his tribal dominion, christened as the "Greg's Monkey Society," donning the mantle of an alchemical virtuoso. Greg's innovation transcended the boundaries of epochs, midwifing the steam era, ushering in the age of low voltage, and birthing an extravagant cavalcade of whimsical epochs. His erudition was meticulously inscribed within a venerable questbook, artfully concealed within the recesses of the formidable Yapussy mountain range.

Neeols found himself profoundly moved by this gripping narrative, and, following the requisite pleasantries, resolutely embarked on an odyssey fraught with peril to unearth the sacred scroll enshrined within the lofty pinnacles of Yapussy.

After an arduous and relentless sojourn, he was at last able to imbibe the raw knowledge enshrined within this hallowed relic. The experience was nothing short of transcendental, with each facet of Greg's existence leaving an indelible impression upon neeols's psyche. It became irrefutably clear that this was the zenith of his life's purpose.

Thus, neeols transplanted himself to the majestic pinnacles of Yacunt, where he undertook the establishment of his own bastion of intellect, the "People's Ingenuity Union." It was within this crucible of experimentation that he unearthed heretofore unseen machinations and revolutionary processes, secrets concealed even from the annals of Greg's own records.

Through an unceasing march of scientific inquiry, he ascended to a divine status, endowing himself with the ability to expedite the balls at an unprecedented pace.

Alas, the inexorable maw of the Wall of Flesh claimed neeols at the venerable age of eight millennia (as attested in the annals of the manga, though his visage defied the conventional markers of time). 

His peers offered poignant reflections:

"He was my cherished confidant, and the cataclysmic event of his demise bore an ineffable weight upon my soul. Following a tweet linked to his Facebook account, his final missive read, 'get back to work monkey' From that moment forth, he vanished from our midst."
"The magnificent aspect of 'Yharon's' theme resides in its admonition to Yharim, signalling that our collective might surpass even the Tyrant himself. This is not solely Yharon's theme; it is our theme."
"A week following his discovery by Gregic sentinels, I swathed his form in gabagool—a sinister design, indeed >:)"
"He compelled me to ingest cement when I was but a tender sapling of six years."
"Balls."

In his final moments, neeols held the aspiration that a myriad of Gregic souls would discover inspiration within his odyssey, replete with experiences both profound and surreal (full of meth and weed).
